entries.text: "add" button to put in widgets such as: title, icon, number, symbol, due date/time
Shawn's idea - journal prompts. Save them to JSON and then add the ability to make custom prompts in the Settings menu.
Entries with widgets such as: title, icon, number, symbol, due date/time
Entry settings such as show/hide checkboxes should be specific to the save data file, not global like color scheme settings
Date and time shows original creation date - click to show edit history
Allow custom fonts, in addition to the default Tkinter ones
Put settings in a canvas with a scrollbar so that it can be scrollable
Add font size adjustments to font settings
"add" button to put in widgets such as: title, icon, number, symbol, due date/time, prmopt
